alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Lamb; Parmer (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 9:38PM CDT until May 23 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN BAILEY...SOUTHEASTERN PARMER AND NORTHWESTERN LAMB COUNTIES... At 937 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles south of Friona to Progress to 8 miles east of Arch, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Muleshoe, Friona, Bovina, Lazbuddie, Oklahoma Lane, Progress, Lariat, West Camp and Black. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
